import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Container, Card, Row, Col, Button ,Modal} from 'react-bootstrap' const Pizza = ({ pizza }) => { const [varient, setVarient] = useState('small') const [qunatity, setQuantity] = useState(1) const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return ( {pizza.name}
Varients

price : {pizza.prices[0][varient] * qunatity} /- â‚¹

 ) } export default Pizza
